title: Harvesting Sweet Potatoes at Don's Produce

subtasks: Digging to proper depth (for the potato harvester)
Adjusting the harvester's settings as needed
Avoiding damage to sweet potatoes during digging
Monitoring moisture levels in the soil for young plants
Applying irrigation if necessary to promote plant establishment
Timing plantings to align with local climate and rainfall patterns
Curing stored sweet potatoes before long-term winter storage
Transferring sweet potatoes from the washing area to storage trailer
Controlling sweet potato runners to concentrate growth
Evaluating the need for irrigation based on plant progress
